Class StandardBom

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object

      • getStandardBomVersion

        @CheckForNull
public String getStandardBomVersion()
        Determine if this SBOM contains a Standard BOM declaration, and if so, return its version number.
        Returns:
        the Standard BOM version number declared in this SBOM represented by this object, or null if no such information can be found
